title: OCE under threat
body: Hello everyone, ive just recenly found at that their was another attack this morning in Germany, from a few sources of mine Australia might be a target soon, so just all be careful of upcoming big events.

replies.body: Why would you say that? That's so rude and macabre
..... you reallly need to seek help mate.
I think i heard something as well. Can't remember well though..
Then why should anyone believe you?
i can not provide certain intel, believe what you want to believe my friend. im not forcing anyone to listen im just saying be careful
Because people wouldn't be careful anyway?
im trying to give you a warning if you want to throw it back in my face be my guest just dont post shit on my forums

> im trying to give you a warning

Except you've blatantly refused to provide a source for this "fact", how is that a warning of anything?

Fact is anyone can claim anywhere is the next target, that doesn't make it true. If people are smart they'll be cautious regardless of your "warning".

dude if you were smart and not a child youll understand the point when certain information cant be provided is for a reason, i dont care what you think or what you have to say. im just pointing out since not everyone is aware, if you want to be immature i dont care but if something does happen at least i posted my warning, what have you done?
